Line.MultilineString: You stumble across an unlooted treasure room. Amidst piles of creates the inviting tops of chests peak out at you, beckoning you in.
As you enter the room however the floor creaks and groans, and a part of the far corner collapses, taking a chest with it.
You'll have to move fast if you want to salvage anything before room comes down.
The ground gives way before you can grab much and you have to jump back out of the room. The treasures drop down into the blackness below.
You manage to escape with armfuls of treasure, just in before the ground collapses, taking the empty chests down into the dark.
